description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Signature_MethodObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Signature_MethodObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Signature_MethodObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Signature_Method_Data.description: This is the Signature Method unique identifier.
This is the Signature Method in text.

validation.validation: A Signature Method already exists with this name.

Signature_Method_Data.description: This is the description of the Signature Method.
